English.Text: Your party's craft is rewarded, if not with the fountains of gold they had anticipated. The lamps are first cleaned and supplied with new wicks and fuel, before being relit and carefully shielded from the wind. The fractured cavity is exposed— adorning its bone-white walls, a pictoral history of the career of the mighty pirate Barragán, who once made this imposing rock his refuge. Feeling enlightened, the expedition leaves with a spring in its step.
